name: AniLibria STRM Plugin
description: Creates .strm / .edl / .nfo files for AniLibria titles and favourites.
overview: Generates STRM libraries for the full catalogue and/or user favourites, with EDL intro-skip and proper NFO metadata.

versions.changelog:
• Removed Jellyfin core DLLs from the bundle
• Added Polly retry logic only (Polly.*, Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly)
• Target ABI bumped to 10.10.0.0
